pageinfo.titlea: What is wallet-management and how does it work?
pageinfo.info1a: The first step to enjoy the benefits of wallet-management is to be registered
pageinfo.info2a: wallet-management is a tool to manage your expenses and investments privately and to share the content you want to make public
pageinfo.info3a: We can follow profiles of other users and imitate the movements in their financial management, the content of these profiles may have a cost at the choice of the user who publishes it
pageinfo.info1b: Controlling personal expenses and income is the basis of a coherent and controlled economy
pageinfo.info12b: The possibility of being able to follow the recommendations and movements of experts allows our information in this sector to cultivate a firm base of knowledge
pageinfo.info3b: The content you publish can only be seen by partners, position yourself in the rankings and get partners to subscribe to your publications
